text: Christopher Kennedy "Chris" Lawford (March 29, 1955 â€“ September 4, 2018) was an American writer, actor, producer and political activist. He was a member of the Kennedy family. He was the son of actor Peter Lawford and Patricia Kennedy Lawford. Lawford was born in Santa Monica, California. Lawford was known for his roles in Terminator 3: Rise of the Machines, Thirteen Days, and General Hospital.
